attributes.action: declare that Gavin Le Boutillier of Bilton is the new King of Britain and President of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gavin is absolutely fantastic. He's generous, kind and of distantly French and Jewish origin so he could say what he like without being thought of as politically incorrect

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
